page.title: 14THE GHOST OF BRAMALL HALL
page.content: In Bramall Hall there is a ghost of Dame Dorothy Davenport she built most of the Hall.The ghost haunts her bedroom which is also called the ghost room or the paradise room.A man called Rodger who worked at The Hall once went into the paradise room and he heard rustling,he thought it was Lorna who also worked there.Then a hand touched his shoulder and a voice said "HELLO" he turned round and saw Dame Dorothy,he ran off screaming.The same thing happened when two school boys went into the room so they turned and ran out.Lorna gave them both a cup of tea to relieve them.They were very frightened.Both of these incidents happened to people who did not believe in ghosts.
